title: Inventory

xdm:sessionId.title: Session ID
xdm:sessionId.description: Session ID associated with experience event, used to stitch together independent events which occurred in the same session.

xdm:feedId.title: Feed ID
xdm:feedId.description: Composite id of the publisher, ad exchange, and other features.

xdm:sspPartnerCode.title: SSP Partner Code
xdm:sspPartnerCode.description: The partner (exchange) through which AdCloud receives the inventory opportunity.

xdm:siteId.title: Site ID
xdm:siteId.description: Identifier for the web site where ad impression was served.

xdm:costCurrency.title: Cost Currency
xdm:costCurrency.description: The ISO 4217 currency code used to pay partner for in ad opportunity.

xdm:inventorySourceId.title: Inventory Source ID
xdm:inventorySourceId.description: The id of the AdCloud inventory source this opportunity was delivered on.

xdm:segment.title: Segmentation Details
xdm:segment.description: Details associatied with user segmentation rules.
